movie.title: Stockton on My Mind
movie.description_intro: Mayor Tubbs through his first term in office as he tirelessly advances his innovative proposals for a city at a turning point.
movie.description_full: Mayor Tubbs through his first term in office as he tirelessly advances his innovative proposals for a city at a turning point.

movies.title: Sidelined
movies.summary: NFL Cheerleaders find themselves embroiled in controversy and constant media coverage after they pose for Playboy magazine in 1978.
movies.description_full: NFL Cheerleaders find themselves embroiled in controversy and constant media coverage after they pose for Playboy magazine in 1978.
movies.synopsis: NFL Cheerleaders find themselves embroiled in controversy and constant media coverage after they pose for Playboy magazine in 1978.

movies.title: Chuck Berry: Hail! Hail! Rock 'n' Roll
movies.title_english: Chuck Berry: Hail! Hail! Rock 'n' Roll
movies.title_long: Chuck Berry: Hail! Hail! Rock 'n' Roll (1987)
movies.summary: St. Louis, Missouri. For Chuck Berry's 60th birthday, Keith Richards assembles a pickup band of Robert Cray, Joey Spampinato, Eric Clapton, himself, and longtime pianist Johnnie Johnson. Joined on stage by Etta James, Linda Ronstadt and Julian Lennon, Berry performs his classic rock songs. His abilities as a composer, lyricist, singer, musician and entertainer are on display and, in behind-the-scenes interviews, are discussed by Bo Diddley, Little Richard, Jerry Lee Lewis, Roy Orbison, the Everly Brothers, Bruce Springsteen and others. There's even a rarity for Berry, a rehearsal. Archival footage from the early 1950s and a duet with John Lennon round out this portrait of a master.

movies.title: City of Ghosts
movies.summary: A documentary that follows the efforts of "Raqqa Is Being Slaughtered Silently," a handful of anonymous activists who banded together after their homeland was taken over by ISIS in 2014. With deeply personal access, this is the story of a brave group of citizen journalists as they face the realities of life undercover, on the run, and in exile, risking their lives to stand up against one of the greatest evils in the world today.

movies.title: Shirley: Visions of Reality
movies.summary: 13 of Edward Hopper's paintings are brought alive by the film, telling the story of a woman, whose thoughts, emotions and contemplations let us observe an era in American history. Shirley is a woman in America in the 1930s, '40s, '50s, and early '60s. A woman who would like to influence the course of history with her professional and socio political involvement.
